A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''December 31, 2009''' at 22:55 UTC<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(17:55:08) <Notch> uploading!!"..."(17:57:08) <Notch> It's up! It's done!" (22:57 UTC)</ref>. It was announced, bundled with [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20091231-2147|the previous version]], on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 22:57 UTC<ref>[[wordofnotch:310275237|One hour to go, not looking too good]] – The Word of Notch, December 31, 2009</ref><ref name=newyear>[[wordofnotch:310352985|I did it! Happy new year!!]] – The Word of Notch, December 31, 2009</ref>. This is the final version released in 2009.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Rana.png|32px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* Can take damage<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(18:05:46) <Leonardo> Notch, are you SUPPOSED to kill the froggirl?"..."(18:06:01) <Notch> Leonardo: If you wish"..."(18:06:05) <Notch>	you can push her into lava now too"</ref>
